Title: How Apple’s New Spotlight Compares to Raycast
Description:
The new Spotlight launcher tool coming to macOS this year looks and works a lot like the indie application Raycast.
Here’s what they can both do, and how they differ.

Title: US allies break with Trump to force diplomatic shift on Gaza

Title: Officials forced to shut down popular beach due to concerning infestation: 'This decision comes after extensive consultation'

Title: A dragon in the Grand Canyon? Researchers name new fossil for 'Star Wars' creature
Description: Researchers from the University of Cambridge have unearthed thousands of microscopic fossils from the iconic Canyon, including a new species.

Title: Battlefield 6 Suffers Significant Leaks Ahead of Official Multiplayer Reveal
Description:
